description: standing nude female with PR knee slightly bent; PR hand on back of head; PL hand behind body; hair pulled back in a low roll around back of head; dark patina with green
inscription: on back of base, incised: Alexis Rudier / Foundeur Paris
signed: on PR top side of base, incised: M [inside a circle]
text: Maillol was captivated by the female nude, and is known primarily for his depiction of the subject in a formalized manner, which references classical Greek sculpture.
title: Standing Nude
